summary: My take on the FXAA PPI settings
descriptionHtml:
Slight warming in colors along with slight sharpening.

Crisps up the graphics and makes the colors seem more vibrant and realistic. May be a touch too warm, but I\'ve grown to like it.

Uses FXAA Post Process Injector by some_dude and Retspadez.
 - Mods installed and shown in two screencaps:
   - Enhanced Night Skyrim by CptJoker71 ; http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=85
   - Alternate HQ Water Texture Mod by Kman420 ; http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1095


Install:

Download and install FXAA PPI
 - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=131
Install FXAA PPI as normal
Open the .rar file with winrar, 7zip, etc.
Navigate to your Skyrim main folder
Replace injFX_Settings.h with mine


Uninstall:

Uninstall with the uninstaller from FXAA PPI.
author: clubstoopkid
